column4: 2018 there was a traffic accident between three motorbikes on Rainbow Bridge
column5: Kampot. A 42-year-old  and 33-year-old Cambodian were injured
column6: along with Dutch national JEROEN BOBELDIJK
column7: who suffered head injuries.------The men were taken to hospital and all three motorcycles went to the police station in Kampot town.------WARNING: Graphic images of the scene in source link:------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/278926
